HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 5,50 EUR for orders below 50,00 EUR. Free for orders above 50,00 EUR.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Isporuka će uslijediti u roku od osam (8) dana od dana narudžbe, a najkasnije u zakonom propisanom roku od trideset (30) dana. Očekujemo da će Vaša narudžba biti isporučena u roku od sedam do deset (7-10) dana od dana otpreme.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only available delivery method is home delivery.
PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by GLS Croatia d.o.o.
PRICING: The shipping fee is 5,50 EUR for orders under 50,00 EUR. Delivery is free for all orders valued at 50,00 EUR or more.
DELIVERY TIME: The expected delivery time is 7-10 days from the date of shipment, with a maximum legal delivery period of 30 days.
RESTRICTIONS: No specific restrictions for island deliveries are mentioned.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website offers a relatively low free shipping threshold. No other delivery options like parcel shops, lockers, or in-store pickup are available. Information about COD, express, or weekend delivery is not provided.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Dostava' page. However, it lacks details on several common delivery services and options, providing only basic home delivery information.
